      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114096</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A magnet moving towards a coil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Magnet, der in Richtung zu einer Spule 
bewegt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un aimant se déplaçant vers un enroulement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um ímã que move-se para uma bobina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un magnete che si muove verso una bobina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας μαγνήτης που κινείται προς ένα πηνίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un imán que se mueve hacia una bobina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the incorrect (a) and correct (b)  direction of induced current flowing in the coil when a magnet moves near it.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht das falsche (a) und 
die korrekte (b) Richtung des geverursachten aktuellen Fließens in 
die Spule, wenn ein Magnet nahe ihm bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare le (a) incorrect et 
(b) la direction correcte de l'entrée actuelle induite dans 
l'enroulement quand un aimant se déplace près de lui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara o (a) incorreto e (b) o
sentido correto de fluir atual induzido na bobina quando um ímã se 
move perto dele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta il (a) errato e 
(b) il senso corretto di entrare corrente indotto nella bobina quando 
un magnete si muove vicino esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει το ανακριβές (α) και τη 
σωστή (β) κατεύθυνση της προκληθείσας παρούσας ροής στο πηνίο 
όταν κινείται ένας μαγνήτης κοντά σε την.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara el (a) incorrecto y (b)
la dirección correcta de fluir actual inducido en la bobina cuando un
imán se mueve cerca de él.</string>
          </description>
